vdm_lustre:assume.vdm_lustre:name: Speed is always a non-negative value

vdm_lustre:guarantee.vdm_lustre:name: Cruise control is enabled if and only if it is On
Desired speed setting
Desired speed increment
Desired speed decrement
Desired speed invariance

vdm_lustre:assume.vdm_lustre:name: Speed is always a non-negative value

vdm_lustre:guarantee.vdm_lustre:name: Force is zero when desired speed is not greater than the current speed
Force is bounded by a proportional factor of the speed difference
Speed is initially zero
Speed is updated every second
Speed stays unchanged when it is not updated
If filter is not enabled, just relay the desired speed
If filter is enabled and incomming desired speed is within the expected range, then just relay it to outgoing filtered desired speed
If filter is enabled but incomming desired speed is not within the expected range, then smooth the filtered desired speed into the expected range
If filter is enabled but incomming desired speed is not within the expected range, then smooth the filtered desired speed into the expected range
If filter is enabled but the difference of incomming desired speed and previous filtered speed is more than 10, then adjust it to the expected difference
If filter is enabled but the difference of incomming desired speed and previous filtered speed is more than 10, then adjust it to the expected difference
If filter is enabled but the difference of incomming desired speed and previous filtered speed is more than 10, then adjust it to the expected difference
If filter is enabled but the difference of incomming desired speed and previous filtered speed is more than 10, then adjust it to the expected difference
1. Cruise Controller System is enabled only if desired speed is within Cruise Controller minimum and maximun speed
2. Cruise Controller System with its filter is enabled only if desired speed is within Cruise Controller filtered minimum and maximun speed
3. Cruise Controller System with its filter is enabled only if difference between two consecutive desired speeds are not greater than the filter expected difference
4. Cruise Controller System is disabled initially
5. When Cruise Controller System is disabled, the desired speed does not get changed
6. When Cruise Controller System is enabled and speed increase request does not exceed the maximum cruise controller speed, the desired speed is then increased accordingly

7. When Cruise Controller System is enabled and speed decrease request does not make desired speed become less than the minimum cruise controller speed, the desired speed is then decreased accordingly
8. When Cruise Controller System is enabled and no button is pressed, the desired speed does not get changed
9. Force is zero if Cruise Controller System is enabled and the desired speed is not greater than the current speed
10. Force is positive if Cruise Controller System is enabled and the desired speed is greater than the current speed
